text: Arkady Georgievich Andreasyan (, ; 11 August 1947 â€“ 23 December 2020) was a Soviet Armenian football player and manager. He played as midfielder for Ararat Yerevan in most of his club career and for the Soviet Union national football team. He won bronze at the 1972 Summer Olympics with the national team. He was the manager of Ararat Yerevan. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Armenian footballers Category:Soviet footballers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Football managers
title: Arkady Andreasyan
